Parking
FREE OFFSITE PARKING & SHUTTLE BUS SERVICE
- Free parking and shuttle service from Palm Beach County Administrative Complex located at 345 S. Congress Avenue, Delray Beach, FL. (Allow 30 minutes for shuttle bus.) Large box trucks and RV’s also permitted. Hours 10am – 9:30 Friday & Saturday / 10am – 6:30pm Sunday.
METERED STREET PARKING
- Although you must pay to park in areas metered, the city will be changing the Park Mobile app to allow you to extend your time indefinitely during the day. *There is a set number of hours visitors are typically able to park downtown, but during the weekend this will be able to be extended.
YOU CAN USE THE PARK MOBILE APP
DELRAY MARKET GARAGE
at 33 SE 3rd Avenue (5 stories of parking).
YOU CAN USE THE PARK MOBILE APP
iPic MOVIE THEATER
at 25 SE 4th Avenue.
$5.00 ALL DAY PARKING AT OLD SCHOOL SQUARE PARKING GARAGE
at 140 NE 1st Street, Federspiel Garage at 22 SE 1st Avenue. 100% proceeds benefit Delray Beach Police Explorers.
$10 ST. PAUL'S EPISCOPAL CHURCH
surface parking at 188 South Swinton Avenue.
FREEBEE
- FREE golf cart transportation in downtown from your parking location! Download the
FREEBEE app
to request pick-up.
LOCATION
Atlantic Avenue in Downtown Delray Beach
Dates & Times
• Friday, April 10, 2026, 10am - 6pm
• Saturday, April 11, 2026, 10am - 6pm
• Sunday, April,12, 2026, 10am - 5pm
Festival Features
• Over 500 Artists & Crafters.
• Ofﬁcial Merchandise Booth with Commemorative Poster, T-Shirts, Hats and more!
• Food Vendors

ABOUT THE DELRAY AFFAIR
APRIL 10, 11, & 12
Downtown Delray Beach
> > CLICK HERE FOR INFO & PARKING < <
Get ready to immerse yourself in an exhilarating artistic extravaganza like no other as the Greater Delray Beach Chamber of Commerce presents the 64th edition of the Delray Affair in 2026! Get ready to witness the “Greatest Show under the Sun,” a spectacle that has earned its reputation as the premier arts and craft festival in the Southeast United States. Brace yourself for an awe-inspiring event that will ignite your imagination and leave you breathless.
Picture this: the vibrant streets of Delray Beach, adorned with majestic palm trees, come alive as the Delray Affair stretches across an astonishing 7 city blocks. This sprawling artistic wonderland is renowned for its eclectic fusion of art, exquisite crafts, and funky products sourced from all corners of the globe. Prepare to be enchanted by a melting pot of creativity, where artists and crafters from across the United States converge to showcase their exceptional talent.
The Delray Affair has garnered numerous accolades for its remarkable contribution to the world of art and craftsmanship. It’s a melting pot of innovation, where traditional techniques blend seamlessly with cutting-edge creations. As you wander through the vibrant streets, you’ll discover a treasure trove of masterpieces that will ignite your senses and transport you to a world of wonder.
This isn’t just an ordinary art event—it’s an immersive experience that invites you to explore the extraordinary. Lose yourself in the diverse range of artistic expressions, from mesmerizing paintings to intricate sculptures, captivating photography, and beyond. Each step unveils a new discovery, a new opportunity to connect with the artists and their captivating stories.
As you stroll through the Delray Affair, you’ll be captivated by the infectious energy that permeates the air. Feel the pulse of creativity as the streets come alive with live demonstrations, engaging workshops, and interactive experiences that invite you to unleash your own artistic spirit.
And let’s not forget the backdrop against which this magnificent event takes place. Delray Beach has earned the title of “The Most Fun Small Town in the US,” and it’s easy to see why. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere, where the charm of the city melds seamlessly with the excitement of the Delray Affair. From delightful cafes and gourmet restaurants to chic boutiques and unique shops, Delray Beach offers the perfect setting to complement your artistic adventure.
Join us at the Delray Affair, where art becomes a living, breathing entity and creativity knows no bounds. Get ready to be dazzled by a fusion of artistic brilliance, to revel in the vibrant energy that fills the streets, and to ignite your own passion for the arts. The countdown to the greatest art event of the year has begun, and you won’t want to miss a single moment of this extraordinary celebration of creativity.7
An Award Winning Event!
The Delray Affair has received numerous local, regional and national awards.
Awards include:
